body_html:
@gunan Probably yes, it's better we still have it for now.
I can only confirm we don't need it when job name is as short as tensorflow
Setting set -e sounds good to me, just add it in the beginning of the script, it should be the same as linux.

Why can't you approve this? What else need to be done?

body:
@gunan Probably yes, it's better we still have it for now.
I can only confirm we don't need it when job name is as short as `tensorflow`
Setting `set -e` sounds good to me, just add it in the beginning of the script, it should be the same as linux.

Why can't you approve this? What else need to be done?
